amendment.description: Amendment to remove federal protections for the New Mexico Meadow Jumping Mouse under the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 77 printed in House Report 114-683 to remove federal protections for the New Mexico Meadow Jumping Mouse under the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
